rounds.name: Online Assessment
points: 2-3 questions on infrastructure automation, scripting, and troubleshooting

May include MCQs on cloud services, networking, and SRE concepts

rounds.name: Practical DevOps Round
points: Deploy multi-tier application with Kubernetes, Helm, and monitoring
Focus on production readiness: health checks, autoscaling, observability
Demonstrate knowledge of GitOps, security best practices, and troubleshooting

rounds.name: Infrastructure Design Round
points: Design cloud infrastructure for scalable applications with HA/DR

Live problem-solving: troubleshoot production outages, optimize costs

rounds.name: SRE & Reliability Round

rounds.name: Hiring Manager / Cultural Fit

points: Solve automation problems with Python or Go - focus on clean, efficient code

points: Amazon: Leadership Principles with STAR format

rounds.name: Hiring Committee & Team Match

Amazon: Bar raiser provides independent assessment

projects.title: Production-Grade Kubernetes Platform
projects.description: Build a complete production Kubernetes platform with GitOps, monitoring, autoscaling, and service mesh
projects.shortDescription: Production K8s platform with GitOps and observability
projects.fullDescription: Design and deploy a production-ready Kubernetes platform for microservices. Implement GitOps with ArgoCD, comprehensive monitoring with Prometheus/Grafana, service mesh with Istio, and automated scaling. This project demonstrates advanced container orchestration expertise essential for mid-level DevOps roles.

implementationSteps.title: Set Up Kubernetes Cluster & GitOps
implementationSteps.description: Provision managed Kubernetes cluster on AWS EKS, GKE, or Azure AKS. Install ArgoCD for GitOps-based deployments. Structure Git repository: apps/ for application manifests, infrastructure/ for cluster configs, helm-charts/ for reusable charts. Configure ArgoCD applications with automated sync and self-healing.

implementationSteps.title: Deploy Microservices with Helm
implementationSteps.description: Create Helm charts for 3-tier microservices application (frontend, backend, database). Implement ConfigMaps for configuration, Secrets for credentials, and PersistentVolumes for stateful services. Define resource requests/limits, liveness/readiness probes, and pod disruption budgets for high availability.

implementationSteps.title: Implement Service Mesh & Networking
implementationSteps.description: Install Istio service mesh for advanced traffic management, security, and observability. Configure VirtualServices for canary deployments, DestinationRules for load balancing. Implement mTLS for service-to-service encryption. Set up Ingress Gateway with SSL/TLS termination using cert-manager.

implementationSteps.title: Set Up Observability Stack
implementationSteps.description: Deploy Prometheus operator for metrics collection with ServiceMonitors for application and cluster metrics. Install Grafana with pre-built dashboards for Kubernetes, Istio, and application metrics. Deploy EFK stack (Elasticsearch, Fluentd, Kibana) for centralized logging. Implement distributed tracing with Jaeger.

implementationSteps.title: Implement Autoscaling & Resilience
implementationSteps.description: Configure Horizontal Pod Autoscaler based on CPU, memory, and custom metrics. Deploy Cluster Autoscaler for node-level scaling. Implement PodDisruptionBudgets to maintain availability during rolling updates. Add network policies for pod-to-pod security. Test resilience with chaos engineering using LitmusChaos.

implementationSteps.title: Security & Production Hardening
implementationSteps.description: Implement RBAC with least-privilege access for services and users. Deploy Falco for runtime security monitoring. Integrate container image scanning with Trivy in CI/CD. Set up HashiCorp Vault for secrets management with Kubernetes integration. Add OPA Gatekeeper for policy enforcement. Document runbooks for common operational tasks.

projects.title: Multi-Environment CI/CD Pipeline
projects.description: Build enterprise-grade CI/CD pipeline with multi-environment promotion, automated testing, and GitOps deployment
projects.shortDescription: Enterprise CI/CD with GitOps and automated promotion
projects.fullDescription: Create a complete CI/CD pipeline that automates the entire software delivery lifecycle across dev, staging, and production environments. Implement automated testing, security scanning, artifact management, and GitOps-based deployment with approval gates. This project showcases automation expertise valued at high-growth startups and enterprises.

implementationSteps.title: Design Pipeline Architecture
implementationSteps.description: Plan the complete pipeline: code commit triggers CI pipeline (test → build → scan → publish), GitOps repo update triggers deployment to environments. Design environment promotion strategy: dev (auto-deploy), staging (auto-deploy with tests), production (manual approval). Choose tools: GitLab CI or GitHub Actions for CI, ArgoCD for CD.

implementationSteps.title: Build CI Pipeline with Testing
implementationSteps.description: Create .gitlab-ci.yml or GitHub Actions workflow with stages: test, build, scan, publish. Implement unit tests, integration tests, and test coverage reporting. Run linting and code quality checks (SonarQube). Build optimized Docker images with multi-stage Dockerfiles. Tag images with git commit SHA and semantic version.

implementationSteps.title: Implement Security Scanning
implementationSteps.description: Add container image scanning with Trivy or Snyk in CI pipeline - fail build on critical vulnerabilities. Integrate SAST (Static Application Security Testing) for code vulnerabilities. Implement dependency scanning for vulnerable packages. Add infrastructure scanning for Terraform/Kubernetes manifests with Checkov or tfsec.

implementationSteps.title: Set Up Artifact Management & GitOps
implementationSteps.description: Configure container registry (Docker Hub, ECR, or GCR) with proper image retention policies. Create GitOps repository with Kubernetes manifests organized by environment: overlays/dev, overlays/staging, overlays/prod. Use Kustomize for environment-specific configurations. Implement image tag update automation in GitOps repo after successful CI build.

implementationSteps.title: Deploy with ArgoCD & Environment Promotion
implementationSteps.description: Install ArgoCD and configure applications for each environment with automated sync for dev/staging. Implement manual sync with approval for production deployments. Create promotion pipeline: update staging manifest → run smoke tests → manual approval → update prod manifest. Add Slack/email notifications for deployment status.

implementationSteps.title: Implement Rollback & Observability
implementationSteps.description: Add automated rollback on deployment failure using ArgoCD sync hooks and health checks. Implement blue-green or canary deployment strategies with Argo Rollouts. Integrate pipeline metrics: build duration, deployment frequency, failure rate, MTTR. Create deployment dashboard showing pipeline health and environment status. Document rollback procedures and runbooks.

projects.title: Complete SRE Implementation with Observability
projects.description: Build comprehensive SRE platform with monitoring, alerting, SLOs, incident response, and chaos engineering
projects.shortDescription: Complete SRE platform with SLOs and chaos engineering
projects.fullDescription: Design and implement a complete Site Reliability Engineering platform following Google SRE principles. Deploy comprehensive observability stack (metrics, logs, traces), define and monitor SLIs/SLOs, implement on-call alerting, build incident response workflows, and conduct chaos engineering experiments. This advanced project showcases SRE expertise highly valued at top tech companies.

implementationSteps.title: Deploy Observability Stack
implementationSteps.description: Set up comprehensive monitoring: Prometheus for metrics with Thanos for long-term storage, Grafana for visualization, Loki for log aggregation, Tempo for distributed tracing. Deploy exporters: node-exporter (infrastructure metrics), blackbox-exporter (endpoint probing), custom application metrics. Integrate OpenTelemetry for unified observability.

implementationSteps.title: Define SLIs and SLOs
implementationSteps.description: Identify critical user journeys and define Service Level Indicators: availability (uptime %), latency (p99 response time), throughput (requests/sec), error rate (% of failed requests). Set Service Level Objectives: availability 99.9%, p99 latency < 500ms, error rate < 0.1%. Calculate error budgets and burn rate thresholds.

implementationSteps.title: Implement Alerting & On-Call
implementationSteps.description: Configure Prometheus AlertManager with routing rules for different severity levels. Create multi-window, multi-burn-rate alerts for SLO violations (Google SRE book methodology). Integrate with PagerDuty or Opsgenie for on-call management. Implement alert escalation policies and on-call schedules. Add runbooks to alerts with troubleshooting steps.

implementationSteps.title: Build Dashboards & Incident Response
implementationSteps.description: Create Grafana dashboards: SLO dashboard showing error budget consumption, service health overview, infrastructure metrics, application performance. Build incident response workflow: automated incident creation in Jira/PagerDuty on critical alerts, Slack channel creation for collaboration, status page updates. Document incident response procedures.

implementationSteps.title: Implement Chaos Engineering
implementationSteps.description: Deploy LitmusChaos or Chaos Mesh for chaos experiments. Design failure scenarios: pod deletion, network latency injection, CPU/memory stress, service unavailability. Create chaos workflows targeting non-prod environments. Measure system resilience: service availability during chaos, time to recovery, error rate impact. Verify alerts fire correctly during experiments.

implementationSteps.title: Post-Mortems & Continuous Improvement
implementationSteps.description: Create post-mortem template: incident timeline, root cause analysis, impact assessment, action items. Conduct blameless post-mortems after real/simulated incidents. Track MTTR (Mean Time To Recovery), MTTD (Mean Time To Detection), and MTTA (Mean Time To Acknowledge). Build action item tracking dashboard. Implement automated remediation for common incidents.

implementationSteps.title: Production Hardening & Documentation
implementationSteps.description: Add synthetic monitoring with blackbox-exporter for proactive detection. Implement cost monitoring and budget alerts for cloud resources. Create SRE handbook: on-call runbooks, escalation procedures, common troubleshooting scenarios. Build SRE metrics dashboard: error budget status, incident frequency, toil reduction. Present learnings and ROI of SRE implementation.
